subject: JUnit--Tomcat--JDBC DataSource--JNDI
msgSnippet: I m not quite sure how to pose my question...gotten in a little over my head here. Basically, I am writing unit tests for an application that is running on
messageBody:
I'm not quite sure how to pose my question...gotten in a little over
my head here. Basically, I am writing unit tests for an application
that is running on Tomcat 4.xx. Database connectivity is achieved
through the use of a DataSource (configured in Tomcat's server.xml,
web.xml). The actual Java classes that I am testing do a JNDI lookup
on the DataSource to get a connection to the database. The connection
pooling works just fine while running in the Servlet Container, but
my problem is testing through JUnit...does anyone know how to test a
connection that needs to be run through Tomcat?
